short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HireHunch Chrome Extension: Schedule technical interviews on HireHunch directly from your Greenhouse Application Tracking System.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now, technical recruiters using Greenhouse ATS can schedule interviews seamlessly without switching between platforms. You can schedule interviews on HireHunch directly from Greenhouse ATS and eliminate the need to perform repetitive functions. 

HireHunch offer ‘Interview as a Service’ and conducts initial tech rounds so that you:
  • Hire the best candidates quickly
  • Save precious tech bandwidth talking to the right candidates

The HireHunch extension offers an easy and productive approach to technical interview scheduling that will help you generate an interview link directly within the Greenhouse ATS. 

To schedule interviews - 
  • Download HireHunch chrome extension
  • Enter the access key, for steps - https://app.hirehunch.com/greenhouse-help#chrome-extension
  • Log in to your Greenhouse account
  • Open a candidate’s profile in Greenhouse ATS
  • Schedule a HireHunch Interview with just a click
